name: Super Moist Chocolate Bundt® Cake
author: MONICASJ
summary: I wanted to make a chocolate cake without using instant cake mixes and voila! An extremely scrumptious and moist chocolate Bundt® cake! Top with a dusting of powdered sugar or vanilla ice cream if desired.
ingredients: 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
1 ½ cups semisweet chocolate chips, or more to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Generously grease a 10-inch fluted tube pan (such as Bundt®), or use a nonstick pan
Combine flour, sugar, cocoa powder, pudding mix, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
Add milk, oil, and vanilla extract
Beat with an electric mixer on low speed until combined
Beat on high speed for 2 minutes
Add eggs and beat for 2 minutes more
Add warm water and sour cream; beat until combined
Scrape down sides of the bowl
Stir in chocolate chips and pour batter into the prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven until top is springy to the touch and a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 55 to 60 minutes
Remove and let cake cool thoroughly
